newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexican daily port, shipping update for July 30.
newsitem.headline: Mexican daily port, shipping update for July 30.

text.p: All Mexican ports were open to major shipping on Wednesday, the Communications and Transport Ministry (SCT) said in its 1500 local/2000 GMT daily meteorological report.
Pacific beach town port Huatulco was closed to tourism and fishing boats because of high waves, the report said.
A growing tropical storm in the Pacific sparked storms on the coast of the Gulf of Tehuantepec. Strong thunder stroms reported all along Mexico's Pacific coast.
Rains expected in the evening along Veracruz, Tabasco and Campeche, with clear skies seen in the remainder of the Gulf of Mexico.
